arts.ttl: Peterborough earn impressive point at Stevenage
Costly error again the undoing of Stevenage as they draw with Peterborough
arts.sum: Dan Kemp's 10th goal of the season had put Boro in front 10 minutes into the second half but Cian Hayes came off the bench to equalise after an error by Jordan Roberts. Perhaps more telling was Kemp's pass seconds earlier, pushed down the right towards Roberts when he obviously missed Edwards totally unmarked down the left side.

arts.ttl: Mouth of the Tyne: Predicting the Stevenage team to face Peterborough in League One
arts.sum: For all he said he wanted to mix up, I think he'll go with it pretty much as is and just make like for like changes - Harvey White for Louis Thompson and Elliott List for Jamie Reid. I have dropped Jamie Reid though, not sure if that's my own feelings coming into play, but Revs might want to make one statement to the group and this would be a big one.

arts.ttl: League One player ratings for Crawley Town v Stevenage
arts.sum: Took a booking early in the second half and that left him vulnerable to the pace of Crawley, and they kept coming with swiftness every time. And as I said on Saturday, I don't mind when players are just poor, that can happen, and nobody would say Crawley didn't deserve their 3-1 success.

arts.ttl: Preview: Stevenage vs. Peterborough United - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Stevenage and Peterborough United, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
